content: knit this dainty baby blanket with beautiful texture using the dot stitch and worsted weight yarn the sample uses 4 skeins of color theory yarn in the shade tourmaline the gorgeous dot stitch is framed by a lovely garter stitch border instructions are given for how to create clean chained edges once you fall into the rhythm of the dot stitch you will love whipping up this blanket and seeing the lovely textured pattern build up the free pattern can be found *** here 1 *** note that the printable pdf is a total of 4 pages including the cover pages pdf is in english only the chunky version using super bulky level 6 yarn can be found *** here 2 *** 1 https //www allaboutami com/dotty-baby-blanket/ 2 https //www allaboutami com/chunky-dotty-blanket/
